ACT_17_20: xenizonta gar tina eisphereis eis tas akoas hēmōn boulometha oun gnōnai tina thelei tauta einai
ACT_17_21: Athēnaioi de pantes kai hoi epidēmountes xenoi eis ouden heteron ēukairoun ē legein ti ē akouein ti kainoteron
ACT_17_22: Statheis de ho Paulos en mesō tou Areiou Pagou ephē Andres Athēnaioi kata panta hōs deisidaimonesterous hymas theōrō
ACT_17_23: dierchomenos gar kai anatheōrōn ta sebasmata hymōn heuron kai bōmon en hō epegegrapto AGNŌSTŌ THEŌ Ho oun agnoountes eusebeite touto egō katangellō hymin
ACT_17_24: Ho Theos ho poiēsas ton kosmon kai panta ta en autō houtos ouranou kai gēs hyparchōn Kyrios ouk en cheiropoiētois naois katoikei
ACT_17_25: oude hypo cheirōn anthrōpinōn therapeuetai prosdeomenos tinos autos didous pasi zōēn kai pnoēn kai ta panta
ACT_17_26: epoiēsen te ex henos pan ethnos anthrōpōn katoikein epi pantos prosōpou tēs gēs horisas prostetagmenous kairous kai tas horothesias tēs katoikias autōn
ACT_17_27: zētein ton Theon ei ara ge psēlaphēseian auton kai heuroien kai ge ou makran apo henos hekastou hēmōn hyparchonta
ACT_17_28: En autō gar zōmen kai kinoumetha kai esmen hōs kai tines tōn kath’ hymas poiētōn eirēkasin Tou gar kai genos esmen
ACT_17_29: genos oun hyparchontes tou Theou ouk opheilomen nomizein chrysō ē argyrō ē lithō charagmati technēs kai enthymēseōs anthrōpou to Theion einai homoion
ACT_17_30: Tous men oun chronous tēs agnoias hyperidōn ho Theos ta nyn parangellei tois anthrōpois pantas pantachou metanoein
ACT_17_31: kathoti estēsen hēmeran en hē mellei krinein tēn oikoumenēn en dikaiosynē en andri hō hōrisen pistin paraschōn pasin anastēsas auton ek nekrōn
ACT_17_32: Akousantes de anastasin nekrōn hoi men echleuazon hoi de eipan Akousometha sou peri toutou kai palin
ACT_17_33: houtōs ho Paulos exēlthen ek mesou autōn
ACT_17_34: tines de andres kollēthentes autō episteusan en hois kai Dionysios ho Areopagitēs kai gynē onomati Damaris kai heteroi syn autois
ACT_18_1: Meta tauta chōristheis ek tōn Athēnōn ēlthen eis Korinthon
ACT_18_2: kai heurōn tina Ioudaion onomati Akylan Pontikon tō genei prosphatōs elēlythota apo tēs Italias kai Priskillan gynaika autou dia to diatetachenai Klaudion chōrizesthai pantas tous Ioudaious apo tēs Rhōmēs prosēlthen autois
ACT_18_3: kai dia to homotechnon einai emenen par’ autois kai ērgazeto ēsan gar skēnopoioi tē technē
ACT_18_4: Dielegeto de en tē synagōgē kata pan sabbaton epeithen te Ioudaious kai Hellēnas
ACT_18_5: Hōs de katēlthon apo tēs Makedonias ho te Silas kai ho Timotheos syneicheto tō logō ho Paulos diamartyromenos tois Ioudaiois einai ton Christon Iēsoun
ACT_18_6: antitassomenōn de autōn kai blasphēmountōn ektinaxamenos ta himatia eipen pros autous To haima hymōn epi tēn kephalēn hymōn katharos egō apo tou nyn eis ta ethnē poreusomai
ACT_18_7: Kai metabas ekeithen eisēlthen eis oikian tinos onomati Titou Ioustou sebomenou ton Theon hou hē oikia ēn synomorousa tē synagōgē
ACT_18_8: Krispos de ho archisynagōgos episteusen tō Kyriō syn holō tō oikō autou kai polloi tōn Korinthiōn akouontes episteuon kai ebaptizonto
ACT_18_9: Eipen de ho Kyrios en nykti di’ horamatos tō Paulō Mē phobou alla lalei kai mē siōpēsēs
ACT_18_10: dioti egō eimi meta sou kai oudeis epithēsetai soi tou kakōsai se dioti laos esti moi polys en tē polei tautē
ACT_18_11: Ekathisen de eniauton kai mēnas hex didaskōn en autois ton logon tou Theou
ACT_18_12: Galliōnos de anthypatou ontos tēs Achaias katepestēsan homothymadon hoi Ioudaioi tō Paulō kai ēgagon auton epi to bēma
ACT_18_13: legontes hoti Para ton nomon anapeithei houtos tous anthrōpous sebesthai ton Theon
ACT_18_14: Mellontos de tou Paulou anoigein to stoma eipen ho Galliōn pros tous Ioudaious Ei men ēn adikēma ti ē rhadiourgēma ponēron ō Ioudaioi kata logon an aneschomēn hymōn
ACT_18_15: ei de zētēmata estin peri logou kai onomatōn kai nomou tou kath’ hymas opsesthe autoi kritēs egō toutōn ou boulomai einai
ACT_18_16: kai apēlasen autous apo tou bēmatos
ACT_18_17: Epilabomenoi de pantes Sōsthenēn ton archisynagōgon etypton emprosthen tou bēmatos kai ouden toutōn tō Galliōni emelen
ACT_18_18: Ho de Paulos eti prosmeinas hēmeras hikanas tois adelphois apotaxamenos exeplei eis tēn Syrian kai syn autō Priskilla kai Akylas keiramenos en Kenchreais tēn kephalēn eichen gar euchēn
ACT_18_19: Katēntēsan de eis Epheson kakeinous katelipen autou autos de eiselthōn eis tēn synagōgēn dielexato tois Ioudaiois
ACT_18_20: erōtōntōn de autōn epi pleiona chronon meinai ouk epeneusen
ACT_18_21: alla apotaxamenos kai eipōn Palin anakampsō pros hymas tou Theou thelontos anēchthē apo tēs Ephesou
ACT_18_22: kai katelthōn eis Kaisareian anabas kai aspasamenos tēn ekklēsian katebē eis Antiocheian
ACT_18_23: Kai poiēsas chronon tina exēlthen dierchomenos kathexēs tēn Galatikēn chōran kai Phrygian stērizōn pantas tous mathētas
ACT_18_24: Ioudaios de tis Apollōs onomati Alexandreus tō genei anēr logios katēntēsen eis Epheson dynatos ōn en tais graphais
ACT_18_25: houtos ēn katēchēmenos tēn hodon tou Kyriou kai zeōn tō pneumati elalei kai edidasken akribōs ta peri tou Iēsou epistamenos monon to baptisma Iōannou
ACT_18_26: houtos te ērxato parrēsiazesthai en tē synagōgē akousantes de autou Priskilla kai Akylas proselabonto auton kai akribesteron autō exethento tēn hodon tou Theou
ACT_18_27: Boulomenou de autou dielthein eis tēn Achaian protrepsamenoi hoi adelphoi egrapsan tois mathētais apodexasthai auton hos paragenomenos synebaleto poly tois pepisteukosin dia tēs charitos
ACT_18_28: eutonōs gar tois Ioudaiois diakatēlencheto dēmosia epideiknys dia tōn graphōn einai ton Christon Iēsoun
ACT_19_1: Egeneto de en tō ton Apollō einai en Korinthō Paulon dielthonta ta anōterika merē elthein eis Epheson kai heurein tinas mathētas
ACT_19_2: eipen te pros autous Ei Pneuma Hagion elabete pisteusantes Hoi de pros auton All’ oud’ ei Pneuma Hagion estin ēkousamen
ACT_19_3: Eipen te Eis ti oun ebaptisthēte Hoi de eipan Eis to Iōannou baptisma
ACT_19_4: Eipen de Paulos Iōannēs ebaptisen baptisma metanoias tō laō legōn eis ton erchomenon met’ auton hina pisteusōsin tout’ estin eis ton Iēsoun
ACT_19_5: Akousantes de ebaptisthēsan eis to onoma tou Kyriou Iēsou
ACT_19_6: kai epithentos autois tou Paulou tas cheiras ēlthe to Pneuma to Hagion ep’ autous elaloun te glōssais kai eprophēteuon
ACT_19_7: ēsan de hoi pantes andres hōsei dōdeka
ACT_19_8: Eiselthōn de eis tēn synagōgēn eparrēsiazeto epi mēnas treis dialegomenos kai peithōn ta peri tēs basileias tou Theou
ACT_19_9: hōs de tines esklērynonto kai ēpeithoun kakologountes tēn Hodon enōpion tou plēthous apostas ap’ autōn aphōrisen tous mathētas kath’ hēmeran dialegomenos en tē scholē Tyrannou
ACT_19_10: touto de egeneto epi etē dyo hōste pantas tous katoikountas tēn Asian akousai ton logon tou Kyriou Ioudaious te kai Hellēnas
ACT_19_11: Dynameis te ou tas tychousas ho Theos epoiei dia tōn cheirōn Paulou
ACT_19_12: hōste kai epi tous asthenountas apopheresthai apo tou chrōtos autou soudaria ē simikinthia kai apallassesthai ap’ autōn tas nosous ta te pneumata ta ponēra ekporeuesthai
ACT_19_13: Epecheirēsan de tines kai tōn perierchomenōn Ioudaiōn exorkistōn onomazein epi tous echontas ta pneumata ta ponēra to onoma tou Kyriou Iēsou legontes Horkizō hymas ton Iēsoun hon Paulos kēryssei
ACT_19_14: ēsan de tinos Skeua Ioudaiou archiereōs hepta huioi touto poiountes
ACT_19_15: apokrithen de to pneuma to ponēron eipen autois Ton Men Iēsoun ginōskō kai ton Paulon epistamai hymeis de tines este
ACT_19_16: kai ephalomenos ho anthrōpos ep’ autous en hō ēn to pneuma to ponēron katakyrieusas amphoterōn ischysen kat’ autōn hōste gymnous kai tetraumatismenous ekphygein ek tou oikou ekeinou
ACT_19_17: Touto de egeneto gnōston pasin Ioudaiois te kai Hellēsin tois katoikousin tēn Epheson kai epepesen phobos epi pantas autous kai emegalyneto to onoma tou Kyriou Iēsou
ACT_19_18: polloi te tōn pepisteukotōn ērchonto exomologoumenoi kai anangellontes tas praxeis autōn
ACT_19_19: hikanoi de tōn ta perierga praxantōn synenenkantes tas biblous katekaion enōpion pantōn kai synepsēphisan tas timas autōn kai heuron argyriou myriadas pente
ACT_19_20: Houtōs kata kratos tou Kyriou ho logos ēuxanen kai ischyen
ACT_19_21: Hōs de eplērōthē tauta etheto ho Paulos en tō pneumati dielthōn tēn Makedonian kai Achaian poreuesthai eis Hierosolyma eipōn hoti Meta to genesthai me ekei dei me kai Rhōmēn idein
ACT_19_22: aposteilas de eis tēn Makedonian dyo tōn diakonountōn autō Timotheon kai Eraston autos epeschen chronon eis tēn Asian
ACT_19_23: Egeneto de kata ton kairon ekeinon tarachos ouk oligos peri tēs Hodou
ACT_19_24: Dēmētrios gar tis onomati argyrokopos poiōn naous argyrous Artemidos pareicheto tois technitais ouk oligēn ergasian
ACT_19_25: hous synathroisas kai tous peri ta toiauta ergatas eipen Andres epistasthe hoti ek tautēs tēs ergasias hē euporia hēmin estin
ACT_19_26: kai theōreite kai akouete hoti ou monon Ephesou alla schedon pasēs tēs Asias ho Paulos houtos peisas metestēsen hikanon ochlon legōn hoti ouk eisin theoi hoi dia cheirōn ginomenoi
ACT_19_27: ou monon de touto kindyneuei hēmin to meros eis apelegmon elthein alla kai to tēs megalēs theas Artemidos hieron eis outhen logisthēnai mellein te kai kathaireisthai tēs megaleiotētos autēs hēn holē hē Asia kai hē oikoumenē sebetai
ACT_19_28: Akousantes de kai genomenoi plēreis thymou ekrazon legontes Megalē hē Artemis Ephesiōn
ACT_19_29: kai eplēsthē hē polis tēs synchyseōs hōrmēsan te homothymadon eis to theatron synarpasantes Gaion kai Aristarchon Makedonas synekdēmous Paulou
ACT_19_30: Paulou de boulomenou eiselthein eis ton dēmon ouk eiōn auton hoi mathētai
ACT_19_31: tines de kai tōn Asiarchōn ontes autō philoi pempsantes pros auton parekaloun mē dounai heauton eis to theatron
ACT_19_32: Alloi men oun allo ti ekrazon ēn gar hē ekklēsia synkechymenē kai hoi pleious ouk ēdeisan tinos heneka synelēlytheisan
ACT_19_33: ek de tou ochlou synebibasan Alexandron probalontōn auton tōn Ioudaiōn ho de Alexandros kataseisas tēn cheira ēthelen apologeisthai tō dēmō
ACT_19_34: epignontes de hoti Ioudaios estin phōnē egeneto mia ek pantōn hōs epi hōras dyo krazontōn Megalē hē Artemis Ephesiōn
ACT_19_35: Katasteilas de ho grammateus ton ochlon phēsin Andres Ephesioi tis gar estin anthrōpōn hos ou ginōskei tēn Ephesiōn polin neōkoron ousan tēs megalēs Artemidos kai tou diopetous
ACT_19_36: anantirrētōn oun ontōn toutōn deon estin hymas katestalmenous hyparchein kai mēden propetes prassein
ACT_19_37: ēgagete gar tous andras toutous oute hierosylous oute blasphēmountas tēn theon hēmōn
ACT_19_38: Ei men oun Dēmētrios kai hoi syn autō technitai echousi pros tina logon agoraioi agontai kai anthypatoi eisin enkaleitōsan allēlois
ACT_19_39: ei de ti peraiterō epizēteite en tē ennomō ekklēsia epilythēsetai
ACT_19_40: kai gar kindyneuomen enkaleisthai staseōs peri tēs sēmeron mēdenos aitiou hyparchontos peri hou ou dynēsometha apodounai logon peri tēs systrophēs tautēs
ACT_19_41: Kai tauta eipōn apelysen tēn ekklēsian
ACT_20_1: Meta de to pausasthai ton thorybon metapempsamenos ho Paulos tous mathētas kai parakalesas aspasamenos exēlthen poreuesthai eis Makedonian
ACT_20_2: dielthōn de ta merē ekeina kai parakalesas autous logō pollō ēlthen eis tēn Hellada
ACT_20_3: poiēsas te mēnas treis genomenēs epiboulēs autō hypo tōn Ioudaiōn mellonti anagesthai eis tēn Syrian egeneto gnōmēs tou hypostrephein dia Makedonias
ACT_20_4: Syneipeto de autō Sōpatros Pyrrou Beroiaios Thessalonikeōn de Aristarchos kai Sekoundos kai Gaios Derbaios kai Timotheos Asianoi de Tychikos kai Trophimos
ACT_20_5: houtoi de proelthontes emenon hēmas en Trōadi
ACT_20_6: hēmeis de exepleusamen meta tas hēmeras tōn azymōn apo Philippōn kai ēlthomen pros autous eis tēn Trōada achri hēmerōn pente hopou dietripsamen hēmeras hepta
ACT_20_7: En de tē mia tōn sabbatōn synēgmenōn hēmōn klasai arton ho Paulos dielegeto autois mellōn exienai tē epaurion pareteinen te ton logon mechri mesonyktiou
ACT_20_8: Ēsan de lampades hikanai en tō hyperōō hou ēmen synēgmenoi
ACT_20_9: kathezomenos de tis neanias onomati Eutychos epi tēs thyridos katapheromenos hypnō bathei dialegomenou tou Paulou epi pleion katenechtheis apo tou hypnou epesen apo tou tristegou katō kai ērthē nekros
ACT_20_10: katabas de ho Paulos epepesen autō kai symperilabōn eipen Mē thorybeisthe hē gar psychē autou en autō estin
ACT_20_11: Anabas de kai klasas ton arton kai geusamenos eph’ hikanon te homilēsas achri augēs houtōs exēlthen
ACT_20_12: ēgagon de ton paida zōnta kai pareklēthēsan ou metriōs
ACT_20_13: Hēmeis de proelthontes epi to ploion anēchthēmen epi tēn Asson ekeithen mellontes analambanein ton Paulon houtōs gar diatetagmenos ēn mellōn autos pezeuein
ACT_20_14: hōs de syneballen hēmin eis tēn Asson analabontes auton ēlthomen eis Mitylēnēn
ACT_20_15: kakeithen apopleusantes tē epiousē katēntēsamen antikrys Chiou tē de hetera parebalomen eis Samon tē de echomenē ēlthomen eis Milēton
ACT_20_16: Kekrikei gar ho Paulos parapleusai tēn Epheson hopōs mē genētai autō chronotribēsai en tē Asia espeuden gar ei dynaton eiē autō tēn hēmeran tēs Pentēkostēs genesthai eis Hierosolyma
ACT_20_17: Apo de tēs Milētou pempsas eis Epheson metekalesato tous presbyterous tēs ekklēsias
ACT_20_18: Hōs de paregenonto pros auton eipen autois Hymeis epistasthe apo prōtēs hēmeras aph’ hēs epebēn eis tēn Asian pōs meth’ hymōn ton panta chronon egenomēn
ACT_20_19: douleuōn tō Kyriō meta pasēs tapeinophrosynēs kai dakryōn kai peirasmōn tōn symbantōn moi en tais epiboulais tōn Ioudaiōn
ACT_20_20: hōs ouden hypesteilamēn tōn sympherontōn tou mē anangeilai hymin kai didaxai hymas dēmosia kai kat’ oikous
ACT_20_21: diamartyromenos Ioudaiois te kai Hellēsin tēn eis Theon metanoian kai pistin eis ton Kyrion hēmōn Iēsoun Christon
ACT_20_22: Kai nyn idou dedemenos egō tō pneumati poreuomai eis Ierousalēm ta en autē synantēsonta moi mē eidōs
ACT_20_23: plēn hoti to Pneuma to Hagion kata polin diamartyretai moi legon hoti desma kai thlipseis me menousin
ACT_20_24: all’ oudenos logou poioumai tēn psychēn timian emautō hōs teleiōsai ton dromon mou kai tēn diakonian hēn elabon para tou Kyriou Iēsou diamartyrasthai to euangelion tēs charitos tou Theou
ACT_20_25: Kai nyn idou egō oida hoti ouketi opsesthe to prosōpon mou hymeis pantes en hois diēlthon kēryssōn tēn basileian
ACT_20_26: dioti martyromai hymin en tē sēmeron hēmera hoti katharos eimi apo tou haimatos pantōn
ACT_20_27: ou gar hypesteilamēn tou mē anangeilai pasan tēn boulēn tou Theou hymin
ACT_20_28: Prosechete heautois kai panti tō poimniō en hō hymas to Pneuma to Hagion etheto episkopous poimainein tēn ekklēsian tou Theou hēn periepoiēsato dia tou haimatos tou idiou
ACT_20_29: egō oida hoti eiseleusontai meta tēn aphixin mou lykoi bareis eis hymas mē pheidomenoi tou poimniou
ACT_20_30: kai ex hymōn autōn anastēsontai andres lalountes diestrammena tou apospan tous mathētas opisō heautōn
ACT_20_31: dio grēgoreite mnēmoneuontes hoti trietian nykta kai hēmeran ouk epausamēn meta dakryōn nouthetōn hena hekaston
ACT_20_32: Kai ta nyn paratithemai hymas tō theō kai tō logō tēs charitos autou tō dynamenō oikodomēsai kai dounai tēn klēronomian en tois hēgiasmenois pasin
ACT_20_33: Argyriou ē chrysiou ē himatismou oudenos epethymēsa
ACT_20_34: autoi ginōskete hoti tais chreiais mou kai tois ousin met’ emou hypēretēsan hai cheires hautai
ACT_20_35: panta hypedeixa hymin hoti houtōs kopiōntas dei antilambanesthai tōn asthenountōn mnēmoneuein te tōn logōn tou Kyriou Iēsou hoti autos eipen Makarion estin mallon didonai ē lambanein
ACT_20_36: Kai tauta eipōn theis ta gonata autou syn pasin autois prosēuxato
ACT_20_37: hikanos de klauthmos egeneto pantōn kai epipesontes epi ton trachēlon tou Paulou katephiloun auton
ACT_20_38: odynōmenoi malista epi tō logō hō eirēkei hoti ouketi mellousin to prosōpon autou theōrein proepempon de auton eis to ploion
ACT_21_1: Hōs de egeneto anachthēnai hēmas apospasthentas ap’ autōn euthydromēsantes ēlthomen eis tēn Kō tē de hexēs eis tēn Rhodon kakeithen eis Patara
ACT_21_2: kai heurontes ploion diaperōn eis Phoinikēn epibantes anēchthēmen
ACT_21_3: anaphanantes de tēn Kypron kai katalipontes autēn euōnymon epleomen eis Syrian kai katēlthomen eis Tyron ekeise gar to ploion ēn apophortizomenon ton gomon
ACT_21_4: Aneurontes de tous mathētas epemeinamen autou hēmeras hepta hoitines tō Paulō elegon dia tou Pneumatos mē epibainein eis Hierosolyma
ACT_21_5: hote de egeneto exartisai hēmas tas hēmeras exelthontes eporeuometha propempontōn hēmas pantōn syn gynaixi kai teknois heōs exō tēs poleōs kai thentes ta gonata epi ton aigialon proseuxamenoi
ACT_21_6: apēspasametha allēlous kai enebēmen eis to ploion ekeinoi de hypestrepsan eis ta idia
ACT_21_7: Hēmeis de ton ploun dianysantes apo Tyrou katēntēsamen eis Ptolemaida kai aspasamenoi tous adelphous emeinamen hēmeran mian par’ autois
ACT_21_8: Tē de epaurion exelthontes ēlthomen eis Kaisareian kai eiselthontes eis ton oikon Philippou tou euangelistou ontos ek tōn hepta emeinamen par’ autō
ACT_21_9: toutō de ēsan thygateres tessares parthenoi prophēteuousai
ACT_21_10: Epimenontōn de hēmeras pleious katēlthen tis apo tēs Ioudaias prophētēs onomati Hagabos
ACT_21_11: kai elthōn pros hēmas kai aras tēn zōnēn tou Paulou dēsas heautou tous podas kai tas cheiras eipen Tade legei to Pneuma to Hagion Ton andra hou estin hē zōnē hautē houtōs dēsousin en Ierousalēm hoi Ioudaioi kai paradōsousin eis cheiras ethnōn
ACT_21_12: hōs de ēkousamen tauta parekaloumen hēmeis te kai hoi entopioi tou mē anabainein auton eis Ierousalēm
ACT_21_13: Tote apekrithē ho Paulos Ti poieite klaiontes kai synthryptontes mou tēn kardian egō gar ou monon dethēnai alla kai apothanein eis Ierousalēm hetoimōs echō hyper tou onomatos tou Kyriou Iēsou
ACT_21_14: mē peithomenou de autou hēsychasamen eipontes Tou Kyriou to thelēma ginesthō
ACT_21_15: Meta de tas hēmeras tautas episkeuasamenoi anebainomen eis Hierosolyma
ACT_21_16: synēlthon de kai tōn mathētōn apo Kaisareias syn hēmin agontes par’ hō xenisthōmen Mnasōni tini Kypriō archaiō mathētē
ACT_21_17: Genomenōn de hēmōn eis Hierosolyma asmenōs apedexanto hēmas hoi adelphoi
ACT_21_18: tē de epiousē eisēei ho Paulos syn hēmin pros Iakōbon pantes te paregenonto hoi presbyteroi
ACT_21_19: kai aspasamenos autous exēgeito kath’ hen hekaston hōn epoiēsen ho Theos en tois ethnesin dia tēs diakonias autou
ACT_21_20: Hoi de akousantes edoxazon ton Theon eipon te autō Theōreis adelphe posai myriades eisin en tois Ioudaiois tōn pepisteukotōn kai pantes zēlōtai tou nomou hyparchousin
ACT_21_21: katēchēthēsan de peri sou hoti apostasian didaskeis apo Mōuseōs tous kata ta ethnē pantas Ioudaious legōn mē peritemnein autous ta tekna mēde tois ethesin peripatein
ACT_21_22: ti oun estin pantōs akousontai hoti elēlythas
ACT_21_23: Touto oun poiēson ho soi legomen eisin hēmin andres tessares euchēn echontes eph’ heautōn
ACT_21_24: toutous paralabōn hagnisthēti syn autois kai dapanēson ep’ autois hina xyrēsontai tēn kephalēn kai gnōsontai pantes hoti hōn katēchēntai peri sou ouden estin alla stoicheis kai autos phylassōn ton nomon
ACT_21_25: Peri de tōn pepisteukotōn ethnōn hēmeis epesteilamen krinantes phylassesthai autous to te eidōlothyton kai haima kai pnikton kai porneian
ACT_21_26: Tote ho Paulos paralabōn tous andras tē echomenē hēmera syn autois hagnistheis eisēei eis to hieron diangellōn tēn ekplērōsin tōn hēmerōn tou hagnismou heōs hou prosēnechthē hyper henos hekastou autōn hē prosphora
ACT_21_27: Hōs de emellon hai hepta hēmerai synteleisthai hoi apo tēs Asias Ioudaioi theasamenoi auton en tō hierō synecheon panta ton ochlon kai epebalon ep’ auton tas cheiras
ACT_21_28: krazontes Andres Israēlitai boētheite houtos estin ho anthrōpos ho kata tou laou kai tou nomou kai tou topou toutou pantas pantachē didaskōn eti te kai Hellēnas eisēgagen eis to hieron kai kekoinōken ton hagion topon touton
ACT_21_29: ēsan gar proeōrakotes Trophimon ton Ephesion en tē polei syn autō hon enomizon hoti eis to hieron eisēgagen ho Paulos
ACT_21_30: Ekinēthē te hē polis holē kai egeneto syndromē tou laou kai epilabomenoi tou Paulou heilkon auton exō tou hierou kai eutheōs ekleisthēsan hai thyrai
ACT_21_31: Zētountōn te auton apokteinai anebē phasis tō chiliarchō tēs speirēs hoti holē synchynnetai Ierousalēm
ACT_21_32: hos exautēs paralabōn stratiōtas kai hekatontarchas katedramen ep’ autous hoi de idontes ton chiliarchon kai tous stratiōtas epausanto typtontes ton Paulon
ACT_21_33: Tote engisas ho chiliarchos epelabeto autou kai ekeleusen dethēnai halysesi dysi kai epynthaneto tis eiē kai ti estin pepoiēkōs
ACT_21_34: Alloi de allo ti epephōnoun en tō ochlō mē dynamenou de autou gnōnai to asphales dia ton thorybon ekeleusen agesthai auton eis tēn parembolēn
ACT_21_35: hote de egeneto epi tous anabathmous synebē bastazesthai auton hypo tōn stratiōtōn dia tēn bian tou ochlou
ACT_21_36: ēkolouthei gar to plēthos tou laou krazontes Aire auton
ACT_21_37: Mellōn te eisagesthai eis tēn parembolēn ho Paulos legei tō chiliarchō Ei exestin moi eipein ti pros se Ho de ephē Hellēnisti ginōskeis
ACT_21_38: ouk ara sy ei ho Aigyptios ho pro toutōn tōn hēmerōn anastatōsas kai exagagōn eis tēn erēmon tous tetrakischilious andras tōn Sikariōn
ACT_21_39: Eipen de ho Paulos Egō anthrōpos men eimi Ioudaios Tarseus tēs Kilikias ouk asēmou poleōs politēs deomai de sou epitrepson moi lalēsai pros ton laon
ACT_21_40: epitrepsantos de autou ho Paulos hestōs epi tōn anabathmōn kateseisen tē cheiri tō laō pollēs de sigēs genomenēs prosephōnēsen tē Hebraidi dialektō legōn
ACT_22_1: Andres adelphoi kai pateres akousate mou tēs pros hymas nyni apologias
ACT_22_2: akousantes de hoti tē Hebraidi dialektō prosephōnei autois mallon pareschon hēsychian Kai phēsin
ACT_22_3: Egō eimi anēr Ioudaios gegennēmenos en Tarsō tēs Kilikias anatethrammenos de en tē polei tautē para tous podas Gamaliēl pepaideumenos kata akribeian tou patrōou nomou zēlōtēs hyparchōn tou Theou kathōs pantes hymeis este sēmeron
ACT_22_4: hos tautēn tēn Hodon ediōxa achri thanatou desmeuōn kai paradidous eis phylakas andras te kai gynaikas
ACT_22_5: hōs kai ho archiereus martyrei moi kai pan to presbyterion par’ hōn kai epistolas dexamenos pros tous adelphous eis Damaskon eporeuomēn axōn kai tous ekeise ontas dedemenous eis Ierousalēm hina timōrēthōsin
ACT_22_6: Egeneto de moi poreuomenō kai engizonti tē Damaskō peri mesēmbrian exaiphnēs ek tou ouranou periastrapsai phōs hikanon peri eme
ACT_22_7: epesa te eis to edaphos kai ēkousa phōnēs legousēs moi Saoul Saoul ti me diōkeis
ACT_22_8: Egō de apekrithēn Tis ei Kyrie Eipen te pros eme Egō eimi Iēsous ho Nazōraios hon sy diōkeis
ACT_22_9: hoi de syn emoi ontes to men phōs etheasanto tēn de phōnēn ouk ēkousan tou lalountos moi
ACT_22_10: Eipon de Ti poiēsō Kyrie Ho de Kyrios eipen pros me Anastas poreuou eis Damaskon kakei soi lalēthēsetai peri pantōn hōn tetaktai soi poiēsai
ACT_22_11: Hōs de ouk eneblepon apo tēs doxēs tou phōtos ekeinou cheiragōgoumenos hypo tōn synontōn moi ēlthon eis Damaskon
ACT_22_12: Hananias de tis anēr eulabēs kata ton nomon martyroumenos hypo pantōn tōn katoikountōn Ioudaiōn
ACT_22_13: elthōn pros eme kai epistas eipen moi Saoul adelphe anablepson kagō autē tē hōra aneblepsa eis auton
ACT_22_14: Ho de eipen Ho Theos tōn paterōn hēmōn proecheirisato se gnōnai to thelēma autou kai idein ton Dikaion kai akousai phōnēn ek tou stomatos autou
ACT_22_15: hoti esē martys autō pros pantas anthrōpous hōn heōrakas kai ēkousas
ACT_22_16: kai nyn ti melleis anastas baptisai kai apolousai tas hamartias sou epikalesamenos to onoma autou
ACT_22_17: Egeneto de moi hypostrepsanti eis Ierousalēm kai proseuchomenou mou en tō hierō genesthai me en ekstasei
ACT_22_18: kai idein auton legonta moi Speuson kai exelthe en tachei ex Ierousalēm dioti ou paradexontai sou martyrian peri emou
ACT_22_19: Kagō eipon Kyrie autoi epistantai hoti egō ēmēn phylakizōn kai derōn kata tas synagōgas tous pisteuontas epi se
ACT_22_20: kai hote exechynneto to haima Stephanou tou martyros sou kai autos ēmēn ephestōs kai syneudokōn kai phylassōn ta himatia tōn anairountōn auton
ACT_22_21: Kai eipen pros me Poreuou hoti egō eis ethnē makran exapostelō se
ACT_22_22: Ēkouon de autou achri toutou tou logou kai epēran tēn phōnēn autōn legontes Aire apo tēs gēs ton toiouton ou gar kathēken auton zēn
ACT_22_23: Kraugazontōn te autōn kai rhiptountōn ta himatia kai koniorton ballontōn eis ton aera
ACT_22_24: ekeleusen ho chiliarchos eisagesthai auton eis tēn parembolēn eipas mastixin anetazesthai auton hina epignō di’ hēn aitian houtōs epephōnoun autō
ACT_22_25: Hōs de proeteinan auton tois himasin eipen pros ton hestōta hekatontarchon ho Paulos Ei anthrōpon Rhōmaion kai akatakriton exestin hymin mastizein
ACT_22_26: Akousas de ho hekatontarchēs proselthōn tō chiliarchō apēngeilen legōn Ti melleis poiein ho gar anthrōpos houtos Rhōmaios estin
ACT_22_27: Proselthōn de ho chiliarchos eipen autō Lege moi sy Rhōmaios ei Ho de ephē Nai
ACT_22_28: Apekrithē de ho chiliarchos Egō pollou kephalaiou tēn politeian tautēn ektēsamēn ho De Paulos ephē Egō de kai gegennēmai
ACT_22_29: Eutheōs oun apestēsan ap’ autou hoi mellontes auton anetazein kai ho chiliarchos de ephobēthē epignous hoti Rhōmaios estin kai hoti auton ēn dedekōs
ACT_22_30: Tē de epaurion boulomenos gnōnai to asphales to ti katēgoreitai hypo tōn Ioudaiōn elysen auton kai ekeleusen synelthein tous archiereis kai pan to synedrion kai katagagōn ton Paulon estēsen eis autous
ACT_23_1: Atenisas de ho Paulos tō synedriō eipen Andres adelphoi egō pasē syneidēsei agathē pepoliteumai tō Theō achri tautēs tēs hēmeras
ACT_23_2: ho de archiereus Hananias epetaxen tois parestōsin autō typtein autou to stoma
ACT_23_3: Tote ho Paulos pros auton eipen Typtein se mellei ho Theos toiche kekoniamene kai sy kathē krinōn me kata ton nomon kai paranomōn keleueis me typtesthai
ACT_23_4: Hoi de parestōtes eipan Ton archierea tou Theou loidoreis
ACT_23_5: Ephē te ho Paulos Ouk ēdein adelphoi hoti estin archiereus gegraptai gar hoti Archonta tou laou sou ouk ereis kakōs
ACT_23_6: Gnous de ho Paulos hoti to hen meros estin Saddoukaiōn to de heteron Pharisaiōn ekrazen en tō synedriō Andres adelphoi egō Pharisaios eimi huios Pharisaiōn peri elpidos kai anastaseōs nekrōn egō krinomai
ACT_23_7: Touto de autou lalountos egeneto stasis tōn Pharisaiōn kai Saddoukaiōn kai eschisthē to plēthos
ACT_23_8: Saddoukaioi men gar legousin mē einai anastasin mēte angelon mēte pneuma Pharisaioi de homologousin ta amphotera
ACT_23_9: Egeneto de kraugē megalē kai anastantes tines tōn grammateōn tou merous tōn Pharisaiōn diemachonto legontes Ouden kakon heuriskomen en tō anthrōpō toutō ei de pneuma elalēsen autō ē angelos
ACT_23_10: pollēs de ginomenēs staseōs phobētheis ho chiliarchos mē diaspasthē ho Paulos hyp’ autōn ekeleusen to strateuma kataban harpasai auton ek mesou autōn agein te eis tēn parembolēn
ACT_23_11: Tē de epiousē nykti epistas autō ho Kyrios eipen Tharsei hōs gar diemartyrō ta peri emou eis Ierousalēm houtō se dei kai eis Rhōmēn martyrēsai
ACT_23_12: Genomenēs de hēmeras poiēsantes systrophēn hoi Ioudaioi anethematisan heautous legontes mēte phagein mēte piein heōs hou apokteinōsin ton Paulon
ACT_23_13: ēsan de pleious tesserakonta hoi tautēn tēn synōmosian poiēsamenoi
ACT_23_14: hoitines proselthontes tois archiereusin kai tois presbyterois eipan Anathemati anethematisamen heautous mēdenos geusasthai heōs hou apokteinōmen ton Paulon
ACT_23_15: nyn oun hymeis emphanisate tō chiliarchō syn tō synedriō hopōs katagagē auton eis hymas hōs mellontas diaginōskein akribesteron ta peri autou hēmeis de pro tou engisai auton hetoimoi esmen tou anelein auton
ACT_23_16: Akousas de ho huios tēs adelphēs Paulou tēn enedran paragenomenos kai eiselthōn eis tēn parembolēn apēngeilen tō Paulō
ACT_23_17: proskalesamenos de ho Paulos hena tōn hekatontarchōn ephē Ton neanian touton apage pros ton chiliarchon echei gar apangeilai ti autō
ACT_23_18: Ho men oun paralabōn auton ēgagen pros ton chiliarchon kai phēsin Ho desmios Paulos proskalesamenos me ērōtēsen touton ton neaniskon agagein pros se echonta ti lalēsai soi
ACT_23_19: Epilabomenos de tēs cheiros autou ho chiliarchos kai anachōrēsas kat’ idian epynthaneto Ti estin ho echeis apangeilai moi
ACT_23_20: Eipen de hoti Hoi Ioudaioi synethento tou erōtēsai se hopōs aurion ton Paulon katagagēs eis to synedrion hōs mellon ti akribesteron pynthanesthai peri autou
ACT_23_21: sy oun mē peisthēs autois enedreuousin gar auton ex autōn andres pleious tesserakonta hoitines anethematisan heautous mēte phagein mēte piein heōs hou anelōsin auton kai nyn eisin hetoimoi prosdechomenoi tēn apo sou epangelian
ACT_23_22: Ho men oun chiliarchos apelyse ton neaniskon parangeilas Mēdeni eklalēsai hoti tauta enephanisas pros eme
ACT_23_23: Kai proskalesamenos tinas dyo tōn hekatontarchōn eipen Hetoimasate stratiōtas diakosious hopōs poreuthōsin heōs Kaisareias kai hippeis hebdomēkonta kai dexiolabous diakosious apo tritēs hōras tēs nyktos
ACT_23_24: ktēnē te parastēsai hina epibibasantes ton Paulon diasōsōsi pros Phēlika ton hēgemona
ACT_23_25: grapsas epistolēn echousan ton typon touton
ACT_23_26: Klaudios Lysias Tō kratistō hēgemoni Phēliki Chairein
ACT_23_27: Ton andra touton syllēmphthenta hypo tōn Ioudaiōn kai mellonta anaireisthai hyp’ autōn epistas syn tō strateumati exeilamēn mathōn hoti Rhōmaios estin
ACT_23_28: boulomenos te epignōnai tēn aitian di’ hēn enekaloun autō katēgagon eis to synedrion autōn
ACT_23_29: hon heuron enkaloumenon peri zētēmatōn tou nomou autōn mēden de axion thanatou ē desmōn echonta enklēma
ACT_23_30: Mēnytheisēs de moi epiboulēs eis ton andra esesthai exautēs epempsa pros se parangeilas kai tois katēgorois legein ta pros auton epi sou
ACT_23_31: Hoi men oun stratiōtai kata to diatetagmenon autois analabontes ton Paulon ēgagon dia nyktos eis tēn Antipatrida
ACT_23_32: tē de epaurion easantes tous hippeis aperchesthai syn autō hypestrepsan eis tēn parembolēn
ACT_23_33: hoitines eiselthontes eis tēn Kaisareian kai anadontes tēn epistolēn tō hēgemoni parestēsan kai ton Paulon autō
ACT_23_34: Anagnous de kai eperōtēsas ek poias eparcheias estin kai pythomenos hoti apo Kilikias
ACT_23_35: Diakousomai sou ephē Hotan kai hoi katēgoroi sou paragenōntai keleusas en tō praitōriō tou Hērōdou phylassesthai auton
ACT_24_1: Meta de pente hēmeras katebē ho archiereus Hananias meta presbyterōn tinōn kai rhētoros Tertyllou tinos hoitines enephanisan tō hēgemoni kata tou Paulou
ACT_24_2: Klēthentos de autou ērxato katēgorein ho Tertyllos legōn Pollēs eirēnēs tynchanontes dia sou kai diorthōmatōn ginomenōn tō ethnei toutō dia tēs sēs pronoias
ACT_24_3: pantē te kai pantachou apodechometha kratiste Phēlix meta pasēs eucharistias
ACT_24_4: hina de mē epi pleion se enkoptō parakalō akousai se hēmōn syntomōs tē sē epieikeia
ACT_24_5: Heurontes gar ton andra touton loimon kai kinounta staseis pasin tois Ioudaiois tois kata tēn oikoumenēn prōtostatēn te tēs tōn Nazōraiōn haireseōs
ACT_24_6: hos kai to hieron epeirasen bebēlōsai hon kai ekratēsamen
ACT_24_8: par’ hou dynēsē autos anakrinas peri pantōn toutōn epignōnai hōn hēmeis katēgoroumen autou
ACT_24_9: Synepethento de kai hoi Ioudaioi phaskontes tauta houtōs echein
ACT_24_10: Apekrithē te ho Paulos neusantos autō tou hēgemonos legein Ek pollōn etōn onta se kritēn tō ethnei toutō epistamenos euthymōs ta peri emautou apologoumai
ACT_24_11: dynamenou sou epignōnai hoti ou pleious eisin moi hēmerai dōdeka aph’ hēs anebēn proskynēsōn eis Ierousalēm
ACT_24_12: kai oute en tō hierō heuron me pros tina dialegomenon ē epistasin poiounta ochlou oute en tais synagōgais oute kata tēn polin
ACT_24_13: oude parastēsai dynantai soi peri hōn nyni katēgorousin mou
ACT_24_14: Homologō de touto soi hoti kata tēn Hodon hēn legousin hairesin houtōs latreuō tō patrōō Theō pisteuōn pasi tois kata ton nomon kai tois en tois prophētais gegrammenois
ACT_24_15: elpida echōn eis ton Theon hēn kai autoi houtoi prosdechontai anastasin mellein esesthai dikaiōn te kai adikōn
ACT_24_16: en toutō kai autos askō aproskopon syneidēsin echein pros ton Theon kai tous anthrōpous dia pantos
ACT_24_17: Di’ etōn de pleionōn eleēmosynas poiēsōn eis to ethnos mou paregenomēn kai prosphoras
ACT_24_18: en hais heuron me hēgnismenon en tō hierō ou meta ochlou oude meta thorybou tines de apo tēs Asias Ioudaioi
ACT_24_19: hous edei epi sou pareinai kai katēgorein ei ti echoien pros eme
ACT_24_20: ē autoi houtoi eipatōsan ti heuron adikēma stantos mou epi tou synedriou
ACT_24_21: ē peri mias tautēs phōnēs hēs ekekraxa en autois hestōs hoti Peri anastaseōs nekrōn egō krinomai sēmeron eph’ hymōn
ACT_24_22: Anebaleto de autous ho Phēlix akribesteron eidōs ta peri tēs Hodou eipas Hotan Lysias ho chiliarchos katabē diagnōsomai ta kath’ hymas
ACT_24_23: diataxamenos tō hekatontarchē tēreisthai auton echein te anesin kai mēdena kōlyein tōn idiōn autou hypēretein autō
ACT_24_24: Meta de hēmeras tinas paragenomenos ho Phēlix syn Drousillē tē idia gynaiki ousē Ioudaia metepempsato ton Paulon kai ēkousen autou peri tēs eis Christon Iēsoun pisteōs
ACT_24_25: dialegomenou de autou peri dikaiosynēs kai enkrateias kai tou krimatos tou mellontos emphobos genomenos ho Phēlix apekrithē To nyn echon poreuou kairon de metalabōn metakalesomai se
ACT_24_26: hama kai elpizōn hoti chrēmata dothēsetai autō hypo tou Paulou dio kai pyknoteron auton metapempomenos hōmilei autō
ACT_24_27: Dietias de plērōtheisēs elaben diadochon ho Phēlix Porkion Phēston thelōn te charita katathesthai tois Ioudaiois ho Phēlix katelipe ton Paulon dedemenon
ACT_25_1: Phēstos oun epibas tē eparcheia meta treis hēmeras anebē eis Hierosolyma apo Kaisareias
ACT_25_2: enephanisan te autō hoi archiereis kai hoi prōtoi tōn Ioudaiōn kata tou Paulou kai parekaloun auton
ACT_25_3: aitoumenoi charin kat’ autou hopōs metapempsētai auton eis Ierousalēm enedran poiountes anelein auton kata tēn hodon
ACT_25_4: Ho men oun Phēstos apekrithē tēreisthai ton Paulon eis Kaisareian heauton de mellein en tachei ekporeuesthai
ACT_25_5: Hoi oun en hymin phēsin Dynatoi synkatabantes ei ti estin en tō andri atopon katēgoreitōsan autou
ACT_25_6: Diatripsas de en autois hēmeras ou pleious oktō ē deka katabas eis Kaisareian tē epaurion kathisas epi tou bēmatos ekeleusen ton Paulon achthēnai
ACT_25_7: paragenomenou de autou periestēsan auton hoi apo Hierosolymōn katabebēkotes Ioudaioi polla kai barea aitiōmata katapherontes ha ouk ischyon apodeixai
ACT_25_8: Tou Paulou apologoumenou hoti Oute eis ton nomon tōn Ioudaiōn oute eis to hieron oute eis Kaisara ti hēmarton
ACT_25_9: Ho Phēstos de thelōn tois Ioudaiois charin katathesthai apokritheis tō Paulō eipen Theleis eis Hierosolyma anabas ekei peri toutōn krithēnai ep’ emou
ACT_25_10: Eipen de ho Paulos Hestōs epi tou bēmatos Kaisaros eimi hou me dei krinesthai Ioudaious ouden ēdikēsa hōs kai sy kallion epiginōskeis
ACT_25_11: ei men oun adikō kai axion thanatou pepracha ti ou paraitoumai to apothanein ei de ouden estin hōn houtoi katēgorousin mou oudeis me dynatai autois charisasthai Kaisara epikaloumai
ACT_25_12: Tote ho Phēstos syllalēsas meta tou symbouliou apekrithē Kaisara epikeklēsai epi Kaisara poreusē
ACT_25_13: Hēmerōn de diagenomenōn tinōn Agrippas ho basileus kai Bernikē katēntēsan eis Kaisareian aspasamenoi ton Phēston
ACT_25_14: hōs de pleious hēmeras dietribon ekei ho Phēstos tō basilei anetheto ta kata ton Paulon legōn Anēr tis estin kataleleimmenos hypo Phēlikos desmios
ACT_25_15: peri hou genomenou mou eis Hierosolyma enephanisan hoi archiereis kai hoi presbyteroi tōn Ioudaiōn aitoumenoi kat’ autou katadikēn
ACT_25_16: pros hous apekrithēn hoti ouk estin ethos Rhōmaiois charizesthai tina anthrōpon prin ē ho katēgoroumenos kata prosōpon echoi tous katēgorous topon te apologias laboi peri tou enklēmatos
ACT_25_17: Synelthontōn oun autōn enthade anabolēn mēdemian poiēsamenos tē hexēs kathisas epi tou bēmatos ekeleusa achthēnai ton andra
ACT_25_18: peri hou stathentes hoi katēgoroi oudemian aitian epheron hōn egō hypenooun ponērōn

ROM_15_14: Pepeismai de adelphoi mou kai autos egō peri hymōn hoti kai autoi mestoi este agathōsynēs peplērōmenoi pasēs tēs gnōseōs dynamenoi kai allēlous nouthetein

1CO_1_1: Paulos klētos apostolos Christou Iēsou dia thelēmatos Theou kai Sōsthenēs ho adelphos
1CO_1_2: Tē ekklēsia tou Theou tē ousē en Korinthō hēgiasmenois en Christō Iēsou klētois hagiois syn pasin tois epikaloumenois to onoma tou Kyriou hēmōn Iēsou Christou en panti topō autōn kai hēmōn
1CO_1_3: Charis hymin kai eirēnē apo Theou Patros hēmōn kai Kyriou Iēsou Christou
1CO_1_4: Eucharistō tō Theō mou pantote peri hymōn epi tē chariti tou Theou tē dotheisē hymin en Christō Iēsou
1CO_1_5: hoti en panti eploutisthēte en autō en panti logō kai pasē gnōsei
1CO_1_6: kathōs to martyrion tou Christou ebebaiōthē en hymin
1CO_1_7: hōste hymas mē hystereisthai en mēdeni charismati apekdechomenous tēn apokalypsin tou Kyriou hēmōn Iēsou Christou
1CO_1_8: hos kai bebaiōsei hymas heōs telous anenklētous en tē hēmera tou Kyriou hēmōn Iēsou Christou
1CO_1_9: pistos ho Theos di’ hou eklēthēte eis koinōnian tou Huiou autou Iēsou Christou tou Kyriou hēmōn
1CO_1_10: Parakalō de hymas adelphoi dia tou onomatos tou Kyriou hēmōn Iēsou Christou hina to auto legēte pantes kai mē ē en hymin schismata ēte de katērtismenoi en tō autō noi kai en tē autē gnōmē
1CO_1_11: edēlōthē gar moi peri hymōn adelphoi mou hypo tōn Chloēs hoti erides en hymin eisin
1CO_1_12: legō de touto hoti hekastos hymōn legei Egō men eimi Paulou Egō de Apollō Egō de Kēpha Egō de Christou
1CO_1_13: Memeristai ho Christos mē Paulos estaurōthē hyper hymōn ē eis to onoma Paulou ebaptisthēte
1CO_1_14: eucharistō tō theō hoti oudena hymōn ebaptisa ei mē Krispon kai Gaion
1CO_1_15: hina mē tis eipē hoti eis to emon onoma ebaptisthēte
1CO_1_16: ebaptisa de kai ton Stephana oikon loipon ouk oida ei tina allon ebaptisa
1CO_1_17: ou gar apesteilen me Christos baptizein alla euangelizesthai ouk en sophia logou hina mē kenōthē ho stauros tou Christou
1CO_1_18: Ho logos gar ho tou staurou tois men apollymenois mōria estin tois de sōzomenois hēmin dynamis Theou estin
1CO_1_19: gegraptai gar Apolō tēn sophian tōn sophōn kai tēn synesin tōn synetōn athetēsō
1CO_1_20: Pou sophos pou grammateus pou syzētētēs tou aiōnos toutou ouchi emōranen ho Theos tēn sophian tou kosmou
1CO_1_21: epeidē gar en tē sophia tou Theou ouk egnō ho kosmos dia tēs sophias ton Theon eudokēsen ho Theos dia tēs mōrias tou kērygmatos sōsai tous pisteuontas
1CO_1_22: Epeidē kai Ioudaioi sēmeia aitousin kai Hellēnes sophian zētousin
1CO_1_23: hēmeis de kēryssomen Christon estaurōmenon Ioudaiois men skandalon ethnesin de mōrian
1CO_1_24: autois de tois klētois Ioudaiois te kai Hellēsin Christon Theou dynamin kai Theou sophian
1CO_1_25: Hoti to mōron tou Theou sophōteron tōn anthrōpōn estin kai to asthenes tou Theou ischyroteron tōn anthrōpōn
1CO_1_26: Blepete gar tēn klēsin hymōn adelphoi hoti ou polloi sophoi kata sarka ou polloi dynatoi ou polloi eugeneis
1CO_1_27: alla ta mōra tou kosmou exelexato ho Theos hina kataischynē tous sophous kai ta asthenē tou kosmou exelexato ho Theos hina kataischynē ta ischyra
1CO_1_28: kai ta agenē tou kosmou kai ta exouthenēmena exelexato ho Theos kai ta mē onta hina ta onta katargēsē
1CO_1_29: hopōs mē kauchēsētai pasa sarx enōpion tou Theou
1CO_1_30: Ex autou de hymeis este en Christō Iēsou hos egenēthē sophia hēmin apo Theou dikaiosynē te kai hagiasmos kai apolytrōsis
1CO_1_31: hina kathōs gegraptai Ho kauchōmenos en Kyriō kauchasthō
1CO_2_1: Kagō elthōn pros hymas adelphoi ēlthon ou kath’ hyperochēn logou ē sophias katangellōn hymin to martyrion tou Theou
1CO_2_2: ou gar ekrina ti eidenai en hymin ei mē Iēsoun Christon kai touton estaurōmenon
1CO_2_3: kagō en astheneia kai en phobō kai en tromō pollō egenomēn pros hymas
1CO_2_4: kai ho logos mou kai to kērygma mou ouk en peithois sophias logois all’ en apodeixei Pneumatos kai dynameōs
1CO_2_5: hina hē pistis hymōn mē ē en sophia anthrōpōn all’ en dynamei Theou
1CO_2_6: Sophian de laloumen en tois teleiois sophian de ou tou aiōnos toutou oude tōn archontōn tou aiōnos toutou tōn katargoumenōn
1CO_2_7: alla laloumen Theou sophian en mystēriō tēn apokekrymmenēn hēn proōrisen ho Theos pro tōn aiōnōn eis doxan hēmōn
1CO_2_8: hēn oudeis tōn archontōn tou aiōnos toutou egnōken ei gar egnōsan ouk an ton Kyrion tēs doxēs estaurōsan
1CO_2_9: alla kathōs gegraptai Ha ophthalmos ouk eiden kai ous ouk ēkousen kai epi kardian anthrōpou ouk anebē hosa hētoimasen ho Theos tois agapōsin auton
1CO_2_10: Hēmin gar apekalypsen ho Theos dia tou Pneumatos To gar Pneuma panta erauna kai ta bathē tou Theou
1CO_2_11: tis gar oiden anthrōpōn ta tou anthrōpou ei mē to pneuma tou anthrōpou to en autō houtōs kai ta tou Theou oudeis egnōken ei mē to Pneuma tou Theou
1CO_2_12: hēmeis de ou to pneuma tou kosmou elabomen alla to pneuma to ek tou Theou hina eidōmen ta hypo tou Theou charisthenta hēmin
1CO_2_13: ha kai laloumen ouk en didaktois anthrōpinēs sophias logois all’ en didaktois Pneumatos pneumatikois pneumatika synkrinontes
1CO_2_14: Psychikos de anthrōpos ou dechetai ta tou Pneumatos tou Theou mōria gar autō estin kai ou dynatai gnōnai hoti pneumatikōs anakrinetai
1CO_2_15: ho de pneumatikos anakrinei ta panta autos de hyp’ oudenos anakrinetai
1CO_2_16: Tis gar egnō noun Kyriou hos symbibasei auton hēmeis de noun Christou echomen
1CO_3_1: Kagō adelphoi ouk ēdynēthēn lalēsai hymin hōs pneumatikois all’ hōs sarkinois hōs nēpiois en Christō

1CO_3_4: hotan gar legē tis Egō men eimi Paulou heteros de Egō Apollō ouk anthrōpoi este
1CO_3_5: Ti oun estin Apollōs ti de estin Paulos diakonoi di’ hōn episteusate kai hekastō hōs ho Kyrios edōken

1CO_3_7: hōste oute ho phyteuōn estin ti oute ho potizōn all’ ho auxanōn Theos
1CO_3_8: ho phyteuōn de kai ho potizōn hen eisin hekastos de ton idion misthon lēmpsetai kata ton idion kopon

1CO_3_23: hymeis de Christou Christos de Theou
1CO_4_1: Houtōs hēmas logizesthō anthrōpos hōs hypēretas Christou kai oikonomous mystēriōn Theou
1CO_4_2: hōde loipon zēteitai en tois oikonomois hina pistos tis heurethē
1CO_4_3: Emoi de eis elachiston estin hina hyph’ hymōn anakrithō ē hypo anthrōpinēs hēmeras all’ oude emauton anakrinō
1CO_4_4: ouden gar emautō synoida all’ ouk en toutō dedikaiōmai ho de anakrinōn me Kyrios estin

1CO_10_27: Ei tis kalei hymas tōn apistōn kai thelete poreuesthai pan to paratithemenon hymin esthiete mēden anakrinontes dia tēn syneidēsin
1CO_10_28: ean de tis hymin eipē Touto hierothyton estin mē esthiete di’ ekeinon ton mēnysanta kai tēn syneidēsin
1CO_10_29: syneidēsin de legō ouchi tēn heautou alla tēn tou heterou hina ti gar hē eleutheria mou krinetai hypo allēs syneidēseōs
1CO_10_30: ei egō chariti metechō ti blasphēmoumai hyper hou egō eucharistō
1CO_10_31: Eite oun esthiete eite pinete eite ti poieite panta eis doxan Theou poieite
1CO_10_32: aproskopoi kai Ioudaiois ginesthe kai Hellēsin kai tē ekklēsia tou Theou
1CO_10_33: kathōs kagō panta pasin areskō mē zētōn to emautou symphoron alla to tōn pollōn hina sōthōsin
1CO_11_1: Mimētai mou ginesthe kathōs kagō Christou
1CO_11_2: Epainō de hymas hoti panta mou memnēsthe kai kathōs paredōka hymin tas paradoseis katechete
1CO_11_3: Thelō de hymas eidenai hoti pantos andros hē kephalē ho Christos estin kephalē de gynaikos ho anēr kephalē de tou Christou ho Theos
1CO_11_4: Pas anēr proseuchomenos ē prophēteuōn kata kephalēs echōn kataischynei tēn kephalēn autou
1CO_11_5: pasa de gynē proseuchomenē ē prophēteuousa akatakalyptō tē kephalē kataischynei tēn kephalēn autēs hen gar estin kai to auto tē exyrēmenē
1CO_11_6: ei gar ou katakalyptetai gynē kai keirasthō ei de aischron gynaiki to keirasthai ē xyrasthai katakalyptesthō
1CO_11_7: Anēr men gar ouk opheilei katakalyptesthai tēn kephalēn eikōn kai doxa Theou hyparchōn hē gynē de doxa andros estin
1CO_11_8: ou gar estin anēr ek gynaikos alla gynē ex andros
1CO_11_9: kai gar ouk ektisthē anēr dia tēn gynaika alla gynē dia ton andra
1CO_11_10: dia touto opheilei hē gynē exousian echein epi tēs kephalēs dia tous angelous
1CO_11_11: Plēn oute gynē chōris andros oute anēr chōris gynaikos en Kyriō
1CO_11_12: hōsper gar hē gynē ek tou andros houtōs kai ho anēr dia tēs gynaikos ta de panta ek tou Theou
1CO_11_13: En hymin autois krinate prepon estin gynaika akatakalypton tō Theō proseuchesthai
1CO_11_14: oude hē physis autē didaskei hymas hoti anēr men ean koma atimia autō estin
1CO_11_15: gynē de ean koma doxa autē estin hoti hē komē anti peribolaiou dedotai autē
1CO_11_16: Ei de tis dokei philoneikos einai hēmeis toiautēn synētheian ouk echomen oude hai ekklēsiai tou Theou
1CO_11_17: Touto de parangellōn ouk epainō hoti ouk eis to kreisson alla eis to hēsson synerchesthe
1CO_11_18: prōton men gar synerchomenōn hymōn en ekklēsia akouō schismata en hymin hyparchein kai meros ti pisteuō
1CO_11_19: dei gar kai haireseis en hymin einai hina kai hoi dokimoi phaneroi genōntai en hymin
1CO_11_20: Synerchomenōn oun hymōn epi to auto ouk estin kyriakon deipnon phagein
1CO_11_21: hekastos gar to idion deipnon prolambanei en tō phagein kai hos men peina hos de methyei
1CO_11_22: mē gar oikias ouk echete eis to esthiein kai pinein ē tēs ekklēsias tou Theou kataphroneite kai kataischynete tous mē echontas ti eipō hymin epainesō hymas en toutō ouk epainō
1CO_11_23: Egō gar parelabon apo tou Kyriou ho kai paredōka hymin hoti ho Kyrios Iēsous en tē nykti hē paredideto elaben arton
1CO_11_24: kai eucharistēsas eklasen kai eipen Touto mou estin to sōma to hyper hymōn touto poieite eis tēn emēn anamnēsin
1CO_11_25: hōsautōs kai to potērion meta to deipnēsai legōn Touto to potērion hē kainē diathēkē estin en tō emō haimati touto poieite hosakis ean pinēte eis tēn emēn anamnēsin
1CO_11_26: hosakis gar ean esthiēte ton arton touton kai to potērion pinēte ton thanaton tou Kyriou katangellete achri hou elthē
1CO_11_27: Hōste hos an esthiē ton arton ē pinē to potērion tou Kyriou anaxiōs enochos estai tou sōmatos kai tou haimatos tou Kyriou
1CO_11_28: dokimazetō de anthrōpos heauton kai houtōs ek tou artou esthietō kai ek tou potēriou pinetō
1CO_11_29: ho gar esthiōn kai pinōn krima heautō esthiei kai pinei mē diakrinōn to sōma
1CO_11_30: dia touto en hymin polloi astheneis kai arrōstoi kai koimōntai hikanoi
1CO_11_31: Ei de heautous diekrinomen ouk an ekrinometha
1CO_11_32: krinomenoi de hypo tou Kyriou paideuometha hina mē syn tō kosmō katakrithōmen
1CO_11_33: Hōste adelphoi mou synerchomenoi eis to phagein allēlous ekdechesthe
1CO_11_34: ei tis peina en oikō esthietō hina mē eis krima synerchēsthe Ta de loipa hōs an elthō diataxomai
1CO_12_1: Peri de tōn pneumatikōn adelphoi ou thelō hymas agnoein
1CO_12_2: Oidate hoti hote ethnē ēte pros ta eidōla ta aphōna hōs an ēgesthe apagomenoi
1CO_12_3: dio gnōrizō hymin hoti oudeis en Pneumati Theou lalōn legei Anathema IĒSOUS kai oudeis dynatai eipein Kyrios IĒSOUS ei mē en Pneumati Hagiō
1CO_12_4: Diaireseis de charismatōn eisin to de auto Pneuma
1CO_12_5: kai diaireseis diakoniōn eisin kai ho autos Kyrios
1CO_12_6: kai diaireseis energēmatōn eisin ho de autos Theos ho energōn ta panta en pasin
1CO_12_7: Hekastō de didotai hē phanerōsis tou Pneumatos pros to sympheron
1CO_12_8: hō men gar dia tou Pneumatos didotai logos sophias allō de logos gnōseōs kata to auto Pneuma
1CO_12_9: heterō pistis en tō autō Pneumati allō de charismata iamatōn en tō heni Pneumati
1CO_12_10: allō de energēmata dynameōn allō de prophēteia allō de diakriseis pneumatōn heterō genē glōssōn allō de hermēneia glōssōn
1CO_12_11: panta de tauta energei to hen kai to auto Pneuma diairoun idia hekastō kathōs bouletai
1CO_12_12: Kathaper gar to sōma hen estin kai melē polla echei panta de ta melē tou sōmatos polla onta hen estin sōma houtōs kai ho Christos
1CO_12_13: kai gar en heni Pneumati hēmeis pantes eis hen sōma ebaptisthēmen eite Ioudaioi eite Hellēnes eite douloi eite eleutheroi kai pantes hen Pneuma epotisthēmen
1CO_12_14: Kai gar to sōma ouk estin hen melos alla polla
1CO_12_15: ean eipē ho pous Hoti ouk eimi cheir ouk eimi ek tou sōmatos ou para touto ouk estin ek tou sōmatos
1CO_12_16: kai ean eipē to ous Hoti ouk eimi ophthalmos ouk eimi ek tou sōmatos ou para touto ouk estin ek tou sōmatos
1CO_12_17: ei holon to sōma ophthalmos pou hē akoē ei holon akoē pou hē osphrēsis
1CO_12_18: Nyni de ho Theos etheto ta melē hen hekaston autōn en tō sōmati kathōs ēthelēsen
1CO_12_19: ei de ēn ta panta hen melos pou to sōma
1CO_12_20: nyn de polla men melē hen de sōma
1CO_12_21: Ou dynatai de ho ophthalmos eipein tē cheiri Chreian sou ouk echō ē palin hē kephalē tois posin Chreian hymōn ouk echō
1CO_12_22: alla pollō mallon ta dokounta melē tou sōmatos asthenestera hyparchein anankaia estin
1CO_12_23: kai ha dokoumen atimotera einai tou sōmatos toutois timēn perissoteran peritithemen kai ta aschēmona hēmōn euschēmosynēn perissoteran echei
1CO_12_24: ta de euschēmona hēmōn ou chreian echei Alla ho theos synekerasen to sōma tō hysteroumenō perissoteran dous timēn
1CO_12_25: hina mē ē schisma en tō sōmati alla to auto hyper allēlōn merimnōsin ta melē
1CO_12_26: kai eite paschei hen melos sympaschei panta ta melē eite doxazetai hen melos synchairei panta ta melē
1CO_12_27: Hymeis de este sōma Christou kai melē ek merous
1CO_12_28: Kai hous men etheto ho Theos en tē ekklēsia prōton apostolous deuteron prophētas triton didaskalous epeita dynameis epeita charismata iamatōn antilēmpseis kybernēseis genē glōssōn
1CO_12_29: mē pantes apostoloi mē pantes prophētai mē pantes didaskaloi mē pantes dynameis
1CO_12_30: mē pantes charismata echousin iamatōn mē pantes glōssais lalousin mē pantes diermēneuousin
1CO_12_31: zēloute de ta charismata ta meizona Kai eti kath’ hyperbolēn hodon hymin deiknymi
1CO_13_1: Ean tais glōssais tōn anthrōpōn lalō kai tōn angelōn agapēn de mē echō gegona chalkos ēchōn ē kymbalon alalazon
1CO_13_2: kai ean echō prophēteian kai eidō ta mystēria panta kai pasan tēn gnōsin kai ean echō pasan tēn pistin hōste orē methistanai agapēn de mē echō outhen eimi
1CO_13_3: kai ean psōmisō panta ta hyparchonta mou kai ean paradō to sōma mou hina kauchēsōmai agapēn de mē echō ouden ōpheloumai
1CO_13_4: Hē agapē makrothymei chrēsteuetai hē agapē ou zēloi hē agapē ou perpereuetai ou physioutai
1CO_13_5: ouk aschēmonei ou zētei ta heautēs ou paroxynetai ou logizetai to kakon
1CO_13_6: ou chairei epi tē adikia synchairei de tē alētheia
1CO_13_7: panta stegei panta pisteuei panta elpizei panta hypomenei
1CO_13_8: Hē agapē oudepote piptei eite de prophēteiai katargēthēsontai eite glōssai pausontai eite gnōsis katargēthēsetai
1CO_13_9: ek merous gar ginōskomen kai ek merous prophēteuomen
1CO_13_10: hotan de elthē to teleion to ek merous katargēthēsetai
1CO_13_11: Hote ēmēn nēpios elaloun hōs nēpios ephronoun hōs nēpios elogizomēn hōs nēpios hote gegona anēr katērgēka ta tou nēpiou
1CO_13_12: blepomen gar arti di’ esoptrou en ainigmati tote de prosōpon pros prosōpon arti ginōskō ek merous tote de epignōsomai kathōs kai epegnōsthēn
1CO_13_13: Nyni de menei pistis elpis agapē ta tria tauta meizōn de toutōn hē agapē
1CO_14_1: Diōkete tēn agapēn zēloute de ta pneumatika mallon de hina prophēteuēte
1CO_14_2: ho gar lalōn glōssē ouk anthrōpois lalei alla Theō oudeis gar akouei pneumati de lalei mystēria
1CO_14_3: ho de prophēteuōn anthrōpois lalei oikodomēn kai paraklēsin kai paramythian
1CO_14_4: ho lalōn glōssē heauton oikodomei ho de prophēteuōn ekklēsian oikodomei
1CO_14_5: Thelō de pantas hymas lalein glōssais mallon de hina prophēteuēte meizōn de ho prophēteuōn ē ho lalōn glōssais ektos ei mē diermēneuē hina hē ekklēsia oikodomēn labē
1CO_14_6: Nyn de adelphoi ean elthō pros hymas glōssais lalōn ti hymas ōphelēsō ean mē hymin lalēsō ē en apokalypsei ē en gnōsei ē en prophēteia ē en didachē
1CO_14_7: homōs ta apsycha phōnēn didonta eite aulos eite kithara ean diastolēn tois phthongois mē dō pōs gnōsthēsetai to auloumenon ē to kitharizomenon
1CO_14_8: Kai gar ean adēlon salpinx phōnēn dō tis paraskeuasetai eis polemon
1CO_14_9: houtōs kai hymeis dia tēs glōssēs ean mē eusēmon logon dōte pōs gnōsthēsetai to laloumenon esesthe gar eis aera lalountes
1CO_14_10: Tosauta ei tychoi genē phōnōn eisin en kosmō kai ouden aphōnon
1CO_14_11: ean oun mē eidō tēn dynamin tēs phōnēs esomai tō lalounti barbaros kai ho lalōn en emoi barbaros
1CO_14_12: Houtōs kai hymeis epei zēlōtai este pneumatōn pros tēn oikodomēn tēs ekklēsias zēteite hina perisseuēte
1CO_14_13: Dio ho lalōn glōssē proseuchesthō hina diermēneuē
1CO_14_14: ean gar proseuchōmai glōssē to pneuma mou proseuchetai ho de nous mou akarpos estin
1CO_14_15: Ti oun estin proseuxomai tō pneumati proseuxomai de kai tō noi psalō tō pneumati psalō de kai tō noi
1CO_14_16: epei ean eulogēs en pneumati ho anaplērōn ton topon tou idiōtou pōs erei to Amēn epi tē sē eucharistia epeidē ti legeis ouk oiden
1CO_14_17: sy men gar kalōs eucharisteis all’ ho heteros ouk oikodomeitai
1CO_14_18: Eucharistō tō Theō pantōn hymōn mallon glōssais lalō
1CO_14_19: alla en ekklēsia thelō pente logous tō noi mou lalēsai hina kai allous katēchēsō ē myrious logous en glōssē
1CO_14_20: Adelphoi mē paidia ginesthe tais phresin alla tē kakia nēpiazete tais de phresin teleioi ginesthe
1CO_14_21: en tō nomō gegraptai hoti En heteroglōssois kai en cheilesin heterōn lalēsō tō laō toutō kai oud’ houtōs eisakousontai mou legei Kyrios
1CO_14_22: Hōste hai glōssai eis sēmeion eisin ou tois pisteuousin alla tois apistois hē de prophēteia ou tois apistois alla tois pisteuousin
1CO_14_23: Ean oun synelthē hē ekklēsia holē epi to auto kai pantes lalōsin glōssais eiselthōsin de idiōtai ē apistoi ouk erousin hoti mainesthe
1CO_14_24: ean de pantes prophēteuōsin eiselthē de tis apistos ē idiōtēs elenchetai hypo pantōn anakrinetai hypo pantōn
1CO_14_25: ta krypta tēs kardias autou phanera ginetai kai houtōs pesōn epi prosōpon proskynēsei tō Theō apangellōn hoti Ontōs ho Theos en hymin estin
1CO_14_26: Ti oun estin adelphoi hotan synerchēsthe hekastos psalmon echei didachēn echei apokalypsin echei glōssan echei hermēneian echei panta pros oikodomēn ginesthō
1CO_14_27: Eite glōssē tis lalei kata dyo ē to pleiston treis kai ana meros kai heis diermēneuetō
1CO_14_28: ean de mē ē diermēneutēs sigatō en ekklēsia heautō de laleitō kai tō Theō
1CO_14_29: Prophētai de dyo ē treis laleitōsan kai hoi alloi diakrinetōsan
1CO_14_30: ean de allō apokalyphthē kathēmenō ho prōtos sigatō
1CO_14_31: dynasthe gar kath’ hena pantes prophēteuein hina pantes manthanōsin kai pantes parakalōntai
1CO_14_33: ou gar estin akatastasias ho Theos alla eirēnēs Hōs en pasais tais ekklēsiais tōn hagiōn
1CO_14_34: hai gynaikes en tais ekklēsiais sigatōsan ou gar epitrepetai autais lalein alla hypotassesthōsan kathōs kai ho nomos legei
1CO_14_35: ei de ti mathein thelousin en oikō tous idious andras eperōtatōsan aischron gar estin gynaiki lalein en ekklēsia
1CO_14_36: Ē aph’ hymōn ho logos tou Theou exēlthen ē eis hymas monous katēntēsen
1CO_14_37: Ei tis dokei prophētēs einai ē pneumatikos epiginōsketō ha graphō hymin hoti Kyriou estin entolē
1CO_14_39: Hōste adelphoi mou zēloute to prophēteuein kai to lalein mē kōlyete glōssais
1CO_14_40: panta de euschēmonōs kai kata taxin ginesthō
1CO_15_1: Gnōrizō de hymin adelphoi to euangelion ho euēngelisamēn hymin ho kai parelabete en hō kai hestēkate
1CO_15_2: di’ hou kai sōzesthe tini logō euēngelisamēn hymin ei katechete ektos ei mē eikē episteusate
1CO_15_3: Paredōka gar hymin en prōtois ho kai parelabon hoti Christos apethanen hyper tōn hamartiōn hēmōn kata tas graphas
1CO_15_4: kai hoti etaphē kai hoti egēgertai tē hēmera tē tritē kata tas graphas
1CO_15_5: kai hoti ōphthē Kēpha eita tois dōdeka
1CO_15_6: epeita ōphthē epanō pentakosiois adelphois ephapax ex hōn hoi pleiones menousin heōs arti tines de ekoimēthēsan
1CO_15_7: epeita ōphthē Iakōbō eita tois apostolois pasin
1CO_15_8: eschaton de pantōn hōsperei tō ektrōmati ōphthē kamoi
1CO_15_9: Egō gar eimi ho elachistos tōn apostolōn hos ouk eimi hikanos kaleisthai apostolos dioti ediōxa tēn ekklēsian tou Theou
1CO_15_10: chariti de Theou eimi ho eimi kai hē charis autou hē eis eme ou kenē egenēthē alla perissoteron autōn pantōn ekopiasa ouk egō de alla hē charis tou Theou hē syn emoi
1CO_15_11: eite oun egō eite ekeinoi houtōs kēryssomen kai houtōs episteusate
1CO_15_12: Ei de Christos kēryssetai hoti ek nekrōn egēgertai pōs legousin en hymin tines hoti anastasis nekrōn ouk estin
1CO_15_13: ei de anastasis nekrōn ouk estin oude Christos egēgertai
1CO_15_14: ei de Christos ouk egēgertai kenon ara kai to kērygma hēmōn kenē kai hē pistis hymōn
1CO_15_15: heuriskometha de kai pseudomartyres tou Theou hoti emartyrēsamen kata tou Theou hoti ēgeiren ton Christon hon ouk ēgeiren eiper ara nekroi ouk egeirontai
1CO_15_16: Ei gar nekroi ouk egeirontai oude Christos egēgertai
1CO_15_17: ei de Christos ouk egēgertai mataia hē pistis hymōn estin eti este en tais hamartiais hymōn
1CO_15_18: ara kai hoi koimēthentes en Christō apōlonto
1CO_15_19: ei en tē zōē tautē en Christō ēlpikotes esmen monon eleeinoteroi pantōn anthrōpōn esmen
1CO_15_20: Nyni de Christos egēgertai ek nekrōn aparchē tōn kekoimēmenōn
1CO_15_21: epeidē gar di’ anthrōpou thanatos kai di’ anthrōpou anastasis nekrōn
1CO_15_22: hōsper gar en tō Adam pantes apothnēskousin houtōs kai en tō Christō pantes zōopoiēthēsontai
1CO_15_23: Hekastos de en tō idiō tagmati aparchē Christos epeita hoi tou Christou en tē parousia autou
1CO_15_24: eita to telos hotan paradidō tēn basileian tō Theō kai Patri hotan katargēsē pasan archēn kai pasan exousian kai dynamin
1CO_15_25: dei gar auton basileuein achri hou thē pantas tous echthrous hypo tous podas autou
1CO_15_27: Panta gar Hypetaxen hypo tous podas autou hotan de eipē hoti panta hypotetaktai dēlon hoti ektos tou hypotaxantos autō ta panta
1CO_15_28: hotan de hypotagē autō ta panta tote kai autos ho Huios hypotagēsetai tō hypotaxanti autō ta panta hina ē ho Theos ta panta en pasin
1CO_15_29: Epei ti poiēsousin hoi baptizomenoi hyper tōn nekrōn ei holōs nekroi ouk egeirontai ti kai baptizontai hyper autōn
1CO_15_30: ti kai hēmeis kindyneuomen pasan hōran
1CO_15_31: kath’ hēmeran apothnēskō nē tēn hymeteran kauchēsin adelphoi hēn echō en Christō Iēsou tō Kyriō hēmōn
1CO_15_32: ei kata anthrōpon ethēriomachēsa en Ephesō ti moi to ophelos ei nekroi ouk egeirontai Phagōmen kai piōmen aurion gar apothnēskomen
1CO_15_33: Mē planasthe Phtheirousin ēthē chrēsta homiliai kakai
1CO_15_34: eknēpsate dikaiōs kai mē hamartanete agnōsian gar Theou tines echousin pros entropēn hymin lalō
1CO_15_35: Alla erei tis Pōs egeirontai hoi nekroi poiō de sōmati erchontai
1CO_15_36: aphrōn sy ho speireis ou zōopoieitai ean mē apothanē
1CO_15_37: kai ho speireis ou to sōma to genēsomenon speireis alla gymnon kokkon ei tychoi sitou ē tinos tōn loipōn
1CO_15_38: ho de Theos didōsin autō sōma kathōs ēthelēsen kai hekastō tōn spermatōn idion sōma
1CO_15_39: Ou pasa sarx hē autē sarx alla allē men anthrōpōn allē de sarx ktēnōn allē de sarx ptēnōn allē de ichthyōn
1CO_15_40: kai sōmata epourania kai sōmata epigeia alla hetera men hē tōn epouraniōn doxa hetera de hē tōn epigeiōn
1CO_15_41: allē doxa hēliou kai allē doxa selēnēs kai allē doxa asterōn astēr gar asteros diapherei en doxē
1CO_15_42: Houtōs kai hē anastasis tōn nekrōn speiretai en phthora egeiretai en aphtharsia
1CO_15_43: speiretai en atimia egeiretai en doxē speiretai en astheneia egeiretai en dynamei
1CO_15_44: speiretai sōma psychikon egeiretai sōma pneumatikon Ei estin sōma psychikon estin kai pneumatikon
1CO_15_45: houtōs kai gegraptai Egeneto ho prōtos anthrōpos Adam eis psychēn zōsan ho eschatos Adam eis pneuma zōopoioun
1CO_15_46: All’ ou prōton to pneumatikon alla to psychikon epeita to pneumatikon
1CO_15_47: ho prōtos anthrōpos ek gēs choikos ho deuteros anthrōpos ex ouranou
1CO_15_48: hoios ho choikos toioutoi kai hoi choikoi kai hoios ho epouranios toioutoi kai hoi epouranioi

1CO_15_54: Hotan de to phtharton touto endysētai tēn aphtharsian kai to thnēton touto endysētai athanasian tote genēsetai ho logos ho gegrammenos Katepothē ho thanatos eis nikos
1CO_15_55: Pou sou thanate to nikos pou sou thanate to kentron
1CO_15_56: To de kentron tou thanatou hē hamartia hē de dynamis tēs hamartias ho nomos
1CO_15_57: tō de Theō charis tō didonti hēmin to nikos dia tou Kyriou hēmōn Iēsou Christou

1CO_16_1: Peri de tēs logeias tēs eis tous hagious hōsper dietaxa tais ekklēsiais tēs Galatias houtōs kai hymeis poiēsate
1CO_16_2: kata mian sabbatou hekastos hymōn par’ heautō tithetō thēsaurizōn ho¦ti ean euodōtai hina mē hotan elthō tote logeiai ginōntai
1CO_16_3: hotan de paragenōmai hous ean dokimasēte di’ epistolōn toutous pempsō apenenkein tēn charin hymōn eis Ierousalēm

1CO_16_5: Eleusomai de pros hymas hotan Makedonian dielthō Makedonian gar dierchomai

1CO_16_9: thyra gar moi aneōgen megalē kai energēs kai antikeimenoi polloi

1CO_16_18: anepausan gar to emon pneuma kai to hymōn epiginōskete oun tous toioutous

2CO_1_1: Paulos apostolos Christou Iēsou dia thelēmatos Theou kai Timotheos ho adelphos Tē ekklēsia tou Theou tē ousē en Korinthō syn tois hagiois pasin tois ousin en holē tē Achaia
2CO_1_2: Charis hymin kai eirēnē apo Theou Patros hēmōn kai Kyriou Iēsou Christou
2CO_1_3: Eulogētos ho Theos kai Patēr tou Kyriou hēmōn Iēsou Christou ho Patēr tōn oiktirmōn kai Theos pasēs paraklēseōs
2CO_1_4: ho parakalōn hēmas epi pasē tē thlipsei hēmōn eis to dynasthai hēmas parakalein tous en pasē thlipsei dia tēs paraklēseōs hēs parakaloumetha autoi hypo tou Theou
2CO_1_5: hoti kathōs perisseuei ta pathēmata tou Christou eis hēmas houtōs dia tou Christou perisseuei kai hē paraklēsis hēmōn
2CO_1_6: Eite de thlibometha hyper tēs hymōn paraklēseōs kai sōtērias eite parakaloumetha hyper tēs hymōn paraklēseōs tēs energoumenēs en hypomonē tōn autōn pathēmatōn hōn kai hēmeis paschomen
2CO_1_7: kai hē elpis hēmōn bebaia hyper hymōn eidotes hoti hōs koinōnoi este tōn pathēmatōn houtōs kai tēs paraklēseōs
2CO_1_8: Ou gar thelomen hymas agnoein adelphoi hyper tēs thlipseōs hēmōn tēs genomenēs en tē Asia hoti kath’ hyperbolēn hyper dynamin ebarēthēmen hōste exaporēthēnai hēmas kai tou zēn
2CO_1_9: alla autoi en heautois to apokrima tou thanatou eschēkamen hina mē pepoithotes ōmen eph’ heautois all’ epi tō Theō tō egeironti tous nekrous
2CO_1_10: hos ek tēlikoutou thanatou errysato hēmas kai rhysetai eis hon ēlpikamen hoti kai eti rhysetai
2CO_1_11: synypourgountōn kai hymōn hyper hēmōn tē deēsei hina ek pollōn prosōpōn to eis hēmas charisma dia pollōn eucharistēthē hyper hēmōn
2CO_1_12: Hē gar kauchēsis hēmōn hautē estin to martyrion tēs syneidēseōs hēmōn hoti en hagiotēti kai eilikrineia tou Theou kai ouk en sophia sarkikē all’ en chariti Theou anestraphēmen en tō kosmō perissoterōs de pros hymas
2CO_1_13: ou gar alla graphomen hymin all’ ē ha anaginōskete ē kai epiginōskete elpizō de hoti heōs telous epignōsesthe
2CO_1_14: kathōs kai epegnōte hēmas apo merous hoti kauchēma hymōn esmen kathaper kai hymeis hēmōn en tē hēmera tou Kyriou hēmōn Iēsou
2CO_1_15: Kai tautē tē pepoithēsei eboulomēn proteron pros hymas elthein hina deuteran charin schēte
2CO_1_16: kai di’ hymōn dielthein eis Makedonian kai palin apo Makedonias elthein pros hymas kai hyph’ hymōn propemphthēnai eis tēn Ioudaian
2CO_1_17: Touto oun boulomenos mēti ara tē elaphria echrēsamēn ē ha bouleuomai kata sarka bouleuomai hina ē par’ emoi to Nai nai kai to Ou ou
2CO_1_18: pistos de ho Theos hoti ho logos hēmōn ho pros hymas ouk estin Nai kai Ou
2CO_1_19: ho tou Theou gar Huios Christos Iēsous ho en hymin di’ hēmōn kērychtheis di’ emou kai Silouanou kai Timotheou ouk egeneto Nai kai Ou alla Nai en autō gegonen
2CO_1_20: hosai gar epangeliai Theou en autō to Nai dio kai di’ autou to Amēn tō Theō pros doxan di’ hēmōn

2CO_2_1: Ekrina gar emautō touto to mē palin en lypē pros hymas elthein

2CO_2_3: kai egrapsa touto auto hina mē elthōn lypēn schō aph’ hōn edei me chairein pepoithōs epi pantas hymas hoti hē emē chara pantōn hymōn estin

2CO_2_5: Ei de tis lelypēken ouk eme lelypēken alla apo merous hina mē epibarō pantas hymas
